info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 24 at 1:44AM CDT until May 24 at 5:00AM CDT by NWS Lubbock
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 230 AM CDT FOR NORTHERN LUBBOCK...NORTHEASTERN HOCKLEY...SOUTHERN HALE AND SOUTHEASTERN LAMB COUNTIES... At 144 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 6 miles northwest of Shallowater, or 11 miles west of Abernathy, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Lubbock, Abernathy, Shallowater, Idalou, Petersburg, Anton, Lubbock International Airport and New Deal. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
